content: *a fun christmas holiday decoration or tree ornament lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70705ad corrections applied decrease 13 2007 skill level easy level 2 wool-ease® article #620 4 colors 1 ball each *fisherman cranberry black white/multi* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers small amount gold yarn 2 plastic safety eyes 6 mm diameter fiberfill stuffing special stitch decrease single_crochet decrease some construction required to finish
